Package repository

Class PrescribedMedicationRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository
repository.PrescribedMedicationRepository
public class PrescribedMedicationRepository extends Repository
Prescribed Medication Repository reads, loads,stores and updates data for all csv files for prescribed medication

    • saveAlltoCSV

      public static boolean saveAlltoCSV()
      Saves all prescribed medication records in the repository to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      true if the save operation is successful

    • saveMedicationsToCSV

      public static void saveMedicationsToCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,ArrayList<PrescribedMedication>> diagnosisToMedicationsMap)
      Saves the provided prescribed medication records to the specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to save records to
      diagnosisToMedicationsMap - the map of prescribed medications to save

    • medicationToCSV

      private static String medicationToCSV(String diagnosisID, PrescribedMedication medication)
      Converts a prescribed medication to a CSV-formatted string.
      Parameters:
      diagnosisID - the ID of the diagnosis associated with the medication
      medication - the PrescribedMedication object to convert
      Returns:
      a CSV-formatted string representing the prescribed medication

    • loadMedicationsFromCSV

      private static void loadMedicationsFromCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,ArrayList<PrescribedMedication>> diagnosisToMedicationsMap)
      Loads prescribed medications from the specified CSV file, creating an empty file if not found. Records are added to the provided map.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the CSV file to load from
      diagnosisToMedicationsMap - the map to store the loaded prescribed medications

    • addMedication

      public static void addMedication(String diagnosisID, PrescribedMedication medication)
      Adds a prescribed medication to the map for the specified diagnosis ID.
      Parameters:
      diagnosisID - the ID of the Prescribed Medication associated with the medication
      medication - the PrescribedMedication to add

    • getDiagnosisIDFromCSV

      private static String getDiagnosisIDFromCSV(String csv)
      Extracts the prescribedMed ID from a CSV-formatted string.
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string containing the diagnosis ID
      Returns:
      the diagnosis ID extracted from the CSV string

    • csvToMedication

      private static PrescribedMedication csvToMedication(String csv)
      Converts a CSV-formatted string to a PrescribedMedication object.
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string representing the PrescribedMedication
      Returns:
      a PrescribedMedication object, or null if parsing fails

    • setRepoLoaded

      public static void setRepoLoaded(boolean isRepoLoaded)
      Sets the repository load status.
      Parameters:
      isRepoLoaded - true to set the repository as loaded, false otherwise
